notes.text:
This update for netpbm fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-5849: Fixed out-of-bound read and write issue that can occur in function putgreytile() and put1bitbwtile() (bsc#1022790, bsc#1022791).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: tiffttopnm in netpbm 10.47.63 does not properly use the libtiff TIFFRGBAImageGet function, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and write) via a crafted tiff image file, related to transposing width and height values.
notes.title: CVE description
